name: Yoki, Koto, Kiku
nutshell:
In the ancient House of Nekogami, sibling rivalry is a game of life and death.
The patriarch of the Nekogami family is dead, and his grandson Sukekiyo is the rightful heir. There is just one problem–Sukekiyo is away at war, whereabouts unknown. Only one person can inherit the fortune, and the triplets, Yoki, Koto, and Kiku, aren't going to let Sukekiyo's fiancee, Tamayo, walk off with prize. With a fortune at stake, it's kill or be killed as the Nekogami family goes up against demons, thieves, and each other to protect the family… and the cash!
A parody of the Japanese mystery novel and movie "Inugami-ke no Ichizoku."

name: Super Rich
tags: Official Colored,Psychological,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Daeho Han needs money to save his mother. Jihoon Nam wants revenge.
The two join hands to take on the top 0.01% "super rich" class.

name: Godchild
nutshell: Deep in the heart of 19th century London, a young nobleman named Cain walks the shadowy cobblestone streets of the aristocratic society into which he was born. Forced to become an earl upon the untimely death of his father, Cain assumes the role of head of the Hargreaves, a noble family with a dark past. With Riff, his faithful manservant, and Mary Weather, his 10-year-old half sister, Cain investigates the mysterious crimes that seem to follow him wherever he goes.

name: Yes, My Queen!
nutshell: Welcome to William's Castle, a mysterious top aristocrat school! Here, the light and darkness are like fire and water. The light prince Yi Liuchuan and dark prince Yi Liuying rule the school! What will happen when they meet Miki, a mysterious girl with a fiery temper? How will fate prevail?

name: Dragon Ball Z - Stay Gold (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Vegeta X Bulma
A long time after the fight against Cell, everybody returned to their normal, peaceful life and Vegeta has to pace himself in this kind of lifestyle.
On the other side has Bulma still to choose if she should build the time machine or not. Which decision will she take?

name: Liquor Gummies
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Xiang Qihong, a college student who has been unwilling to go to school for a long time, was entrusted by a university professor and a friend one day to help take care of their nephew! So now all of a sudden there's an older student/neighbour who had an elusive personality. Can Xiang Qihong get along well with the other party if he is so used to living alone?

name: Steady Beat
nutshell: Leah, a sixteen-year-old girl, learns of her sister’s homosexuality through a secret love letter. As she reflects on her sister’s situation, she finds an unexpected friendship from a Jewish boy. A beautiful story about how a girl struggles and comes to accept her sister's true color!

name: How to Snag an Alpha
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
Yoon Wooyoung, the youngest son of a wealthy family. Money, education, appearance, everything's perfect. His only complex is, he is a recessive omega.
However, after the one-night encounter with Cha Kyungjoo, a dominant alpha, there's a strange change in Wooyoung's body.
The bravest recessive omega in the world, Yoon Wooyoung, met an alpha that he'll never miss!

name: 5th Grade Larks
nutshell: Class 1 of the 5th grade is called "The Larks" because the students are as noisy as the chirping of a lark. When the tomboyish Fujino Miki transfers to this class of elementary school students with rich personalities, her classmates, who had been divided into two groups, the hard-working students who want to go on to higher education and those who do not, are in turmoil. This is a representative school drama of the Shouwa era, which portrays the real life of grade school students from a bright and positive point of view, with their friendship, love, bullying, disconnection from their parents, and so on.

name: Boku no Hero Academia - Nekopost (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Todoroki x Midoriya

name: Sedalam Langit
nutshell:
Father, this missing feeling is ever deep. But why are you like a thought that's so far in the air.
SEDALAM LANGIT, a short comic about the limitlessness of dreaming, the meaning of friendship, a wound, and longing. Specially dedicated to: Dads, those who slowly quit smoking. A friend from high school, who was once laughed for having a dream to become a good father. An upperclassman, who was killed viciously by the Nine-Centimeter God*) at an age long before twenty. And, for all the children of the nation who misses the figure named "father".
*) Nine-Centimeter God (Indonesian: Tuhan Sembilan Senti) is a poem by Taufik Ismail about smoking.
(Synopsis translated from Indonesian)

name: Naisho no Princess
nutshell: When Kana was 6 years old, her best friend Kouki moved away to Hokkaido. But before he left, they promised to meet again and get married. For seven years, Kana has kept true to this promise, but when Kouki finally returns, things are not as she had hoped them to be…

name: Madoka and Mei's Secret Workshop
nutshell: Mei, a maid in the estate of the rich Kanzaki family, is sent one day to an old workshop on the grounds. There she meets and befriends Madoka, who turns out to be a daughter of the Kanzakis, and that marks the beginning of their living together in the secret workshop.

name: Unwanted Crush
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Reverse Harem,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Lin Ge, an outwardly cool and collected girl (yet passionate and wild on the inside) who has almost 0 love experience, coincidentally met all her previous one-sided crushes while studying abroad, each one more handsome and talented than the last! And they even told her that they actually had a crush on her back then too?!

name: 2 x Bone
nutshell: Natural selection has created a deadly new species known as "Eclipse," who are driven to eliminate humanity. A scientist called Kurusu Kenji headed an organization whose purpose was to fight these deadly creatures of bone. To this end, he created the "Osteon," Eclipse-like creatures that obey the commands of the human from whose DNA they are created. Now Kenji is gone, and his assistant Kidogawa Rokuko is attempting to recruit his estranged teenage son. Kurusu Akira wanted nothing to do with the father that he believed abandoned him, but attacks from Eclipse force him to accept his own Osteon from Rokuko. He slowly finds himself drawn into the organization, whose members expect him to take his father's place. Akira and his Osteon may have little interest in protecting humanity, but they are determined not to be beaten! [tethysdust]

name: Tenshi wa Nido, Uso wo Tsuku
nutshell:
Sara is a student in a women-only school and has been raised protected and covered from everything. Until one day she crossed paths with a boy as beautiful as he is dangerous…
Pt/Br:
||Sara é uma estudante de um colégio feminino e tem sido criada por uma mãe super protetora. Até que um dia, ela cruzou o caminho de um garoto que é tão perigoso quanto lindo…||

name: Tsurugi to Kiri
nutshell: Zhen, a Wolf assassin, meets a beautiful courtesan while in pursuit of his latest target. Thinking she may be useful, he uses her to get closer to his quarry only to find out that "she" is actually a "he" – another Wolf assassin named Wu. What will happen to the two rivals now that they've flirted and even kissed?! It's assassin on assassin as the Wolves grapple with their destiny and each other.

name: Aegis in the Dark
nutshell: A protector, with an arm of steel, able to deflect bullets, swearing never to take a life. That is Tate Karito, the Shield in the Dark.

name: Kekkon Shite wa Mita Mono no.
nutshell:
「結婚さえすれば幸せになれると思ってた」　平凡なアラサー女子・サトコ(33歳)の新婚生活を綴った、ちょっと切ない物語
なんとなく大学を出て、なんとなく働いていたら、三十路を超えていた……。
そんなサトコがひょんなことからカッコイイ彼氏をゲット！　結婚へ持ち込み、憧れの新婚生活が始まった。変わったばかりの名字に萌え、半日かけた手作りハンバーグで旦那の帰りをしとやかに待っている自分自身を思い描きはじめていた、のだが──。
そこで待ち受けていたのは、微妙に理想とズレた新婚ライフ。新居は夫の希望でプチ田舎、慣れない家事に忙殺される日々、食事の感想もナシ、二人で話し合って決めたダブルベッド購入もドタキャン。ああ、夢にまで見た〝結婚生活〟は何処へ。なんだかイライラを通り越して、虚しさと悲しさが充満してきた……。
「今どきアラサー女子の結婚生活 1年目」をリアルに、コミカルに、時にイジワルに描いたスリリングな新婚コミック。

name: R.I.P.
nutshell:
From Tokyopop:
Transylvania Rose is a bored angel who descends to Earth to clean a few souls. When she witnesses a depressed undertaker slitting his wrists, Rose rips off one of her wings and gives it to the undertaker, trapping them both somewhere between heaven and hell–and life and death!

name: Enji no Hogosha ni Dakarete shimaimashita
nutshell: Sayaka, a kindergarten teacher, has to start doing adult work to cover the moving expenses after her boyfriend left her. However, her very first customer as a call girl is none other than the parent of one of her student…?! Andou-san raises his son on his own and takes him to school every day. Such a kind man, he tells Sayaka take her pay and go home without doing anything. Sayaka refuses, and now Andou-san is going to 'touch her until the time is up.'

name: Makeru na Otoko Yo
nutshell: Average student is in love with star student who may not be the person he seems.

name: Escape Drop
nutshell:
Волей капризного случая Ген Хигаки становится телоранителем еще более капризного Карло.
Поначалу Ген воспринимает своего подопечного как избалованного красавчика-барина, но немного погонявшись за ним, раскрывает в Карло одинокого и потерянного, но очень теплого мальчишку.
Также том включает историю о Джастино и его слуге, Кардиле.

name: Superhuman Era
nutshell:
Unknown monsters have appeared on Earth, alongside ‘Superhumans’ who appear to dispatch them. With these mysterious monsters and superhumans, a new ‘Superhuman Era’ begins!

Links:

Official Simplified Chinese Translation
Official Traditional Chinese Translation
Official Indonesian Translation
Official Japanese Translation
Official Thai Translation


Note: BGM by MZ: S2 Chapter 1-3

name: Gakuen Tengoku
nutshell:
Gakuen Heaven is the story of Oshino Makoto in his attempt to become a teacher, in order to fulfill a promise made to his childhood friend and first love Koiwai Ayano, who also promised that when they see each other again they will get married. However he fails and ends up being a substitute teacher in an all-girls private school ruled by his grandmother. He meets there a lot of female students; especially Narusawa Tsugumi, as well as Asagiri Ayano, a teacher who resembles his long lost first love. He also becomes the love interest of the substitute principal, his cousin Kyouko.
(Source: ANN)

name: Hibiya-san no Kariage
nutshell: A oneshot by Obiya Midori (Starting Today We're Childhood Friends) published in Weekly Shonen Champion #31 2022

name: Yuri Manga
nutshell: A oneshot posted to pixiv by Sinogiasa.

name: I'm a Prisoner in the Demon World
nutshell: The demons invaded and the humans were defeated. The male protagonist Ichiya and his childhood friend Taozi, became prisoners and were escorted to the devil’s lair, where humans were used by demons as laborers, experimental tools, and even food. With his witty mind, Yi Ye dealt with the four major demon masters and got the protection of the demon queen Monqier, but on the condition that he must fall in love with the demon queen and date her? ? ?
